trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.WarningRaised" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.WarningRaised" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: WARNING: marking a type [Serializable] without implementing ISerializable imposes a serialization contract -- it is a promise to never change the type's fields i.e. the type is immutable; adding new fields in the next version of the type without following certain special FX guidelines, can break both forward and backward compatibility
trans-unit.target: 警告： 將標示 [Serializable] 型別，而實作 ISerializable 會加諸序列化合約--它是不會再變更類型的承諾也就是欄位類型不是不可變的;將新欄位類型的下一版中新增未遵循特定的特殊 FX 指導方針，可能會中斷往後和回溯相容性

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to write a basic logger that responds to build events.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何撰寫基本記錄器回應建置事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The custom subcategory of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的自訂子類別。

trans-unit.source: The warning code of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的警告碼。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 與事件相關聯的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: The line number that corresponds to the beginning of the section of code that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 對應到引發事件的程式碼區段開頭的行號。

trans-unit.source: The column number that corresponds to the beginning of the section of code that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 對應引發事件之程式碼區段開頭的欄號。

trans-unit.source: The line number that corresponds to the end of the section of code that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 對應到引發事件的程式碼區段結尾的行號。

trans-unit.source: The column number that corresponds to the end of the section of code that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 對應引發事件之程式碼區段結尾的欄號。

trans-unit.source: The text of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的文字。

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 與事件有關聯的說明關鍵字。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的來源。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs.SubCategory" />, <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs.Code" />, <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs.File" />, <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs.LineNumber" />, <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs.ColumnNumber" />, <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs.EndLineNumber" />, <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs.EndColumnNumber" />, <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.Message" />, <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.HelpKeyword" />, and <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.SenderName" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs.SubCategory" />、<see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs.Code" />、<see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs.File" />、<see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs.LineNumber" />、<see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs.ColumnNumber" />、<see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs.EndLineNumber" />、<see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs.EndColumnNumber" />、<see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.Message" />、<see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.HelpKeyword" /> 和 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.SenderName" /> 值，初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: event subcategory
trans-unit.target: 事件子類別

trans-unit.source: event code
trans-unit.target: 事件代碼

trans-unit.source: file associated with the event
trans-unit.target: 與事件關聯的檔案

trans-unit.source: line number (0 if not applicable)
trans-unit.target: 行號 (如果不適用則為 0)

trans-unit.source: column number (0 if not applicable)
trans-unit.target: 資料行編號 (如果不適用則為 0)

trans-unit.source: end line number (0 if not applicable)
trans-unit.target: 結束行號 (如果不適用則為 0)

trans-unit.target: 結束資料行編號 (如果不適用則為 0)

trans-unit.target: 文字訊息

trans-unit.source: help keyword
trans-unit.target: Help 關鍵字

trans-unit.source: name of event sender
trans-unit.target: 事件發送者的名稱。

trans-unit.source: custom timestamp for the event
trans-unit.target: 事件的自訂時間戳記

trans-unit.source: This constructor allows timestamp to be set
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式允許設定時間戳記。
